gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of all IKE policies for VPN configuration.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of IKE policies with their details.

gold.user: Network engineer creating a new IKE policy for site-to-site VPN.
gold.ideal: Creates a new IKE policy and returns the created policy details.

gold.user: Admin updating the existing IKE policy with ID 1.
gold.ideal: Updates the IKE policy and returns the updated policy details.

gold.user: Network administrator deleting an obsolete IKE policy.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the IKE policy and returns a confirmation message.

gold.user: Security analyst retrieving all IPsec policies for review.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all IPsec policies with their configurations.

gold.user: Network engineer creating a new IPsec proposal for a VPN.
gold.ideal: Creates a new IPsec proposal and returns the details of the created proposal.

gold.user: Admin updating specific fields of IPsec proposal with ID 2.
gold.ideal: Updates specified fields of the IPsec proposal and returns the updated details.

gold.user: Network administrator checking the list of all L2VPNs configured.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all L2VPNs with their configurations.

gold.user: Network engineer creating a new tunnel group for VPN connections.
gold.ideal: Creates a new tunnel group and returns the details of the created group.

gold.user: Admin removing an unused tunnel with ID 3.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the tunnel and returns a confirmation message.

gold.user: Security analyst reviewing all tunnel terminations for compliance.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all tunnel terminations with their details.
